objzz07@bull.desc[0]: An iron key lies here, rusting.

objzz01_3@bull.name: objZZ01_3
objzz01_3@bull.examine: It is a rather coarse brown cape.
objzz01_3@bull.desc[0]: A brown fur cape is piled on the floor here

fur@bull.name: fur
fur@bull.examine: The fur is brown, short, and coarse.

objzz11@bull.name: objZZ11
objzz11@bull.examine: This mask is made out of pure gold, and has two wicked horns.
objzz11@bull.desc[0]: A mask with two wicked horns rests here.

up_bullzz12@bull.name: up_bullZZ12
up_bullzz12@bull.examine: You can't really see much up those stairs.

objzz14@bull.name: objZZ14
objzz14@bull.examine:
Wow! A suit of old chainmail! Who told you these things don't
exist anymore?
objzz14@bull.desc[0]: A set of old chainmail is here, but it's not for mortals!

windowc@bull.name: windowc
windowc@bull.examine: The window looks down upon a grassy field.

down_bullzz13@bull.name: down_bullZZ13
down_bullzz13@bull.examine: You see the bottom of the stairs.

objzz03@bull.name: objZZ03
objzz03@bull.examine: It looks like a seasoned staff.  Probably good for hitting people.
objzz03@bull.desc[0]: A well seasoned staff has been dropped here.

door_bullzz05@bull.name: door_bullZZ05
door_bullzz05@bull.examine: You see a great marble door.  It has a VERY nice polish.

north_bullzz01@bull.name: north_bullZZ01
north_bullzz01@bull.examine: You see the entrance to the temple.

east_bullzz08@bull.name: east_bullZZ08
east_bullzz08@bull.examine: You see a room in the temple.

objzz05@bull.name: objZZ05
objzz05@bull.examine: Its a small marble key, would fit in a marble door methinks.
objzz05@bull.desc[0]: A marble key lies here, gathering dust.

north_bullzz02@bull.name: north_bullZZ02
north_bullzz02@bull.examine: There is an arch to the north.

door_bullzz21@bull.desc[1]: The heavy iron door is closed.
door_bullzz21@bull.name: door_bullZZ21
door_bullzz21@bull.examine: A heavy iron door is there.
door_bullzz21@bull.desc[2]: The heavy iron door is locked.
door_bullzz21@bull.desc[0]: The heavy iron door is open.

objzz17@bull.name: objZZ17
objzz17@bull.examine: It is a highly polished piece of horn, might fit on your wrist.
objzz17@bull.desc[0]: A twisted piece of horn has been dropped here

objzz04@bull.name: objZZ04
objzz04@bull.examine: Yuck, its a smelly wet mop..better run before you have to mop something.
objzz04@bull.desc[0]: A soaking wet mop is here, making a puddle.

windowd@bull.name: windowd
windowd@bull.examine: Its a great, big walk-through window.

objzz12@bull.name: objZZ12
objzz12@bull.examine:
The WABAT bible is printed thus:

I.   Thou shalt behave with honor at all times.
II.  Thou shalt shalt disperse thy enemies with thy sword.
III. Thou shalt defend WABAT and those who cannot 
     defend themselves.
IV.  Thou shalt have no guilds before WABAT.
V.   Thou shalt kill those who take the name of WABAT in vain.

Thus speaketh the WABAT bible.

(Hmmmmm.....okay.)
objzz12@bull.desc[0]: A strange looking bible sits here on the table.

objzz02_1@bull.name: objZZ02_1
objzz02_1@bull.desc[0]: An straight sword is stuck in the ground here.

east_bullzz07@bull.name: east_bullZZ07
east_bullzz07@bull.examine: You see a small garden to the east.

marble@bull.name: marble
marble@bull.examine: It is a remarkably well polished marble door.

north_bullzz04@bull.name: north_bullZZ04
north_bullzz04@bull.examine: You see a room in the temple.

mural@bull.name: mural
mural@bull.examine: The mural shows a great shaggy beast with two pointed horns.

grass@bull.name: grass
grass@bull.examine:
Looks like an average grass stalk.  You pluck one and put it
in your mouth.

balcony@bull.name: balcony
balcony@bull.examine: Its a simple piece of polished wood.  You can see the gardens below.

brook@bull.name: brook
brook@bull.examine: What a nice little bubbling brook!

east_bullzz05@bull.examine: You see a room in the temple.

objzz08@bull.name: objZZ08
objzz08@bull.examine: It is a ring with a golden bull insignia.
objzz08@bull.desc[0]: A ring shaped like a bull lies here.

shelves@bull.name: shelves
shelves@bull.examine: The shelves have been swept clean.

windowb@bull.name: windowb
windowb@bull.examine: The window overlooks a grassy field.

south_bullzz10@bull.examine: You see a room in the temple.

objzz01@bull.name: objZZ01
objzz01@bull.examine: It is a rather coarse brown cape.
objzz01@bull.desc[0]: A brown fur cape is piled on the floor here

west_bullzz09@bull.name: west_bullZZ09
west_bullzz09@bull.examine: There is a small garden over there.

objzz02_2@bull.name: objZZ02_2
objzz02_2@bull.desc[0]: An straight sword is stuck in the ground here.

plants@bull.name: plants
plants@bull.examine: They seem to be doing very well, someone around here has a green thumb.

north_bullzz08@bull.name: north_bullZZ08
north_bullzz08@bull.examine: You see a room in the temple.

ravashem@bull.name: ravashem
ravashem@bull.examine:
It seems this cult has acquired this form of speech through their interaction 
with bulls that allows them to hold long conversations. After a while, all of
these odd words begin to make sense. You feel capable of speaking Ravashem 
now, almost as well as your native language.
ravashem@bull.desc[0]: A volume describing the language of the Ravashem rests here.

north_bullzz07@bull.name: north_bullZZ07
north_bullzz07@bull.examine: There is a stairwell to the north.

south_bullzz18@bull.name: south_bullZZ18
south_bullzz18@bull.examine: Can't really see much..its rather dark over there.

objzz01_1@bull.examine: It is a rather coarse brown cape.
objzz01_1@bull.desc[0]: A brown fur cape is piled on the floor here

objzz16@bull.name: objZZ16
objzz16@bull.examine: They seem to have been stripped off of a Bull.
objzz16@bull.desc[0]: A pair of brown fur leggings lie on the ground here

objzz10@bull.name: objZZ10
objzz10@bull.examine: This was once the skin of a great bull.
objzz10@bull.desc[0]: A great fur cloak is here.

south_bullzz16@bull.name: south_bullZZ16
south_bullzz16@bull.examine: Woah..looks like a dead end.  You get the chills.

south_bullzz02@bull.name: south_bullZZ02
south_bullzz02@bull.examine: Looks like a field back there.

door_bullzz14@bull.name: door_bullZZ14
door_bullzz14@bull.examine: There is an oak door there.

balconya@bull.name: balconya
balconya@bull.examine: Its a simple piece of polished wood.  You can see the gardens below.

objzz15@bull.name: objZZ15
objzz15@bull.examine: It is a holy cloak, crafted by the gods.
objzz15@bull.desc[0]: A holy cloak lies here, but it's not for mortals!

up_bullzz10@bull.name: up_bullZZ10
up_bullzz10@bull.examine: You can't really see much up those stairs.

door_bullzz20@bull.desc[1]: The heavy iron door is closed.
door_bullzz20@bull.name: door_bullZZ20
door_bullzz20@bull.examine: A heavy iron door is there.
door_bullzz20@bull.desc[2]: The heavy iron door is locked.
door_bullzz20@bull.desc[0]: The heavy iron door is open.

south_bullzz11@bull.name: south_bullZZ11
south_bullzz11@bull.examine: There is a small garden to the south.

windowa@bull.name: windowa
windowa@bull.examine: The window overlooks a grassy field.

south_bullzz20@bull.name: south_bullZZ20
south_bullzz20@bull.examine: You see the balcony over there.

objzz13@bull.name: objZZ13
objzz13@bull.examine:
A thin stream of fire runs from the dagger's leather bound hilt to
its razor sharp tip.
objzz13@bull.desc[0]: A burning dagger is lying here, but it's not for mortals!

south_bullzz03@bull.name: south_bullZZ03
south_bullzz03@bull.examine: You see a spot to stand before the temple.

objzz01_2@bull.name: objZZ01_2
objzz01_2@bull.examine: It is a rather coarse brown cape.
objzz01_2@bull.desc[0]: A brown fur cape is piled on the floor here

down_bullzz15@bull.name: down_bullZZ15
down_bullzz15@bull.examine: You see the bottom of the stairs.

objzz02@bull.name: objZZ02
objzz02@bull.desc[0]: An straight sword is stuck in the ground here

objzz06@bull.name: objZZ06
objzz06@bull.examine: It's a small oak key, would fit in an oak door methinks.

bullzz04@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz04@bull.description:
The echo of you footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floor, the walls, the ceiling.....

bullzz03@bull.title: Under the Arch
bullzz03@bull.description:
Your eyes slowly adjust to the level of darkness under the 
protective shade of the arch.  To the north is a great &+Cmarble&* door,
which seems to be the best way to get inside the temple.  "Why the
heck to I want to go in there ?", you think to yourself.  You shrug
your shoulders and suddenly get the feeling that you are being watched.

bullzz13@bull.title: The Upper Temple
bullzz13@bull.description:
You find yourself in a small room atop the stairs.  Strangely
enough, this part of the temple has decorations.  The walls are covered
with &+Cmurals&* and &+Cfurs&*.  A corridor leads off the the south, and the 
stairs offer a retreat downwards.

bullzz17@bull.title: Aten's Chamber
bullzz17@bull.description:
You are standing in a comfortable chamber.  Sunlight streams
in the the open windows, and a warm spring breeze ruffles your hair.
Thick furs cover the stone walls and floor.  A stained oak table
dominates the center of the room, and couches line the walls.  You
look out the window and are vaguely surprised that you can't see 
the ground.

bullzz10@bull.title: The Stairwell
bullzz10@bull.description:
There is a beautiful curving &+Cstairwell&* leading upwards.  It 
seems to have been carved directly from stone.

bullzz09@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz09@bull.description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floor, the walls, the ceiling.....

bullzz18@bull.title: The Corridor
bullzz18@bull.description:
You are standing in a drafty corridor.  There is a &+Cwindow&* set
in the east wall, and a &+Cbalcony&* to the west protects you from falling
into the gardens.

bullzz12@bull.title: The Stairwell
bullzz12@bull.description:
There is a beautiful curving stairwell leading upwards.  It 
seems to have been carved directly from stone.

bullzz05@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz05@bull.description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floors, the walls, the ceiling.....

bullzz20@bull.title: The Bull's Chamber
bullzz20@bull.description:
This room is in TOTAL dissaray.  Items seem to have been 
swept of the room's numerous &+yshelves&* and just dumped on the floor.
The room has an unfamiliar smell, and you wrinkle your nose in
disgust.  An great sliding &+Cwindow&* is open to the south and leads to 
the balcony, and a heavy iron door is to the east.

bullzz22@bull.title: The Balcony
bullzz22@bull.description:
You sense that you have reached journey's end.  The balcony
overlooks a great grassy field.  The sun's rays blind you, and you 
hear a snort.

bullzz06@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz06@bull.description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floor, the walls, the ceiling.....

bullzz15@bull.title: The Upper Temple
bullzz15@bull.description:
You find yourself atop a flight of stairs.  A sturdy oak door
is to the west, a corridor leads south, and the stairs offer a path
downwards.

bullzz19@bull.title: The Cul-de-Sac
bullzz19@bull.description:
The corridor comes to an abrupt halt here, and the only
exit appears to be back the way you came.

bullzz16@bull.title: The Corridor
bullzz16@bull.description:
You are standing in a drafty corridor.  There is a &+Cwindow&* set
in the west wall, and a &+Cbalcony&* to the east protects you from falling
down into the gardens.

bullzz07@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz07@bull.description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floor, the walls, the ceiling.....

bullzz02@bull.title: Before the Temple
bullzz02@bull.description:
The dazzling white stone walls of the temple momentarily
blind you.  Great columns are spaced evenly around the perimeter
of the temple, and an arch beckons you inside.

bullzz21@bull.title: The Dark Chamber
bullzz21@bull.description:
You are in a shadowy chamber, and the hairs at the back of 
your neck begin to rise.  There is so little light in this room that
you start to imagine things..or do you?  You know for certain that
you spotted a door to the west when you first entered.

bullzz01@bull.title: A Grassy Field
bullzz01@bull.description:
You are travelling across a great &+Ggrassy&* field.  The
wind blows softly, causing the ripe ends of the grass stalks 
to bob lazily back and forth.  To the &+Gnorth&* you spy what appears
to be some sort of temple, its great white walls blazing with 
the light of the sun.

bullzz08@bull.title: The Atrium and Gardens
bullzz08@bull.description:
Beautiful green &+Gplants&* wind around bamboo poles here, leaves
outfolded to catch the sun's rays coming in from the open sky.  The
smell of rich dark earth overwhelms your senses, and a small &+Bbrook
winds beneath your feet.

bullzz11@bull.title: The Temple
bullzz11@bull.description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates through the temple.
Everything is white, the tiled floor, the walls, the ceiling.....
There is a nice framed &+Csign &*on the north wall.

bullzz14@bull.title: Mateon's Chamber
bullzz14@bull.description:
You find yourself in a small, cramped chamber.  A &+Cwindow
is set in the north wall, and a sturdy oak door is to the east.

mobzz02_2@bull.name: mobZZ02_2
mobzz02_2@bull.examine:
Well, It doesn't APPEAR to be human.  It looks like a suit of
armor, but why the heck did it just turn to look at you?
mobzz02_2@bull.description: A silver statue has posted itself in the corner.

mobzz07_2@bull.name: mobZZ07_2
mobzz07_2@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07_2@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz03_2@bull.name: mobZZ03_2
mobzz03_2@bull.examine:
This man has dedicated his life to Mateon, and the man behind
the mask.  He turns from the window and stares at you blankly.
mobzz03_2@bull.description: Mateon's Templar is here, looking out the window.

mobzz03_1@bull.name: mobZZ03_1
mobzz03_1@bull.examine:
This man has dedicated his life to Mateon, and the man behind
the mask.  He turns from the window and stares at you blankly.
mobzz03_1@bull.description: Mateon's Templar is here, looking out the window.

mobzz02_1@bull.name: mobZZ02_1
mobzz02_1@bull.examine:
Well, It doesn't APPEAR to be human.  It looks like a suit of
armor, but why the heck did it just turn to look at you?
mobzz02_1@bull.description: A silver statue has posted itself in the corner.

mobzz07_1@bull.name: mobZZ07_1
mobzz07_1@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07_1@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz05@bull.name: mobZZ05
mobzz05@bull.examine:
The Chambermaid looks harried, and glances at you with fear
in her eyes.
mobzz05@bull.description: A Chambermaid is here, desperately trying to straighten up.

mobzz04@bull.name: mobZZ04
mobzz04@bull.examine:
Mateon is a HUGE man.  A huge ANGRY man.  He will NOT
let you NEAR the man behind the mask.
mobzz04@bull.description: Mateon, defender of the Bull, scowers at you!

mobzz02_3@bull.name: mobZZ02_3
mobzz02_3@bull.examine:
Well, It doesn't APPEAR to be human.  It looks like a suit of
armor, but why the heck did it just turn to look at you?
mobzz02_3@bull.description: A silver statue has posted itself in the corner.

mobzz01@bull.name: mobZZ01
mobzz01@bull.examine:
This man looks like an ordinary monk, except he is really
quite a big fella, and seems to have a lot of very fine
brown body hair, even on his palms.. *stare*
mobzz01@bull.description: A shaggy monk stands here quietly.

mobzz06@bull.name: mobZZ06
mobzz06@bull.examine:
You look at this man, and then notice something funny.  It seems 
to be difficult for him to stand on two legs.  As you watch, he
drops to all fours.  You see a glimpse of fur under his cloak.
He peels the mask off and you stare into his brown eyes, and big,
wet, black nose.  'Nice nose ring', you think.
mobzz06@bull.description: A man wearing a golden mask watches you.

mobzz07_3@bull.name: mobZZ07_3
mobzz07_3@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07_3@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz07_4@bull.name: mobZZ07_4
mobzz07_4@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07_4@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz02@bull.name: mobZZ02
mobzz02@bull.examine:
Well, It doesn't APPEAR to be human.  It looks like a suit of
armor, but why the heck did it just turn to look at you?
mobzz02@bull.description: A silver statue has posted itself in the corner.

mobzz07@bull.name: mobZZ07
mobzz07@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz03_3@bull.examine:
This man has dedicated his life to Mateon, and the man behind
the mask.  He turns from the window and stares at you blankly.
mobzz03_3@bull.description: Mateon's Templar is here, looking out the window.

mobzz07_5@bull.name: mobZZ07_5
mobzz07_5@bull.examine:
The acolyte wanders around, looking for a broom.  He is
making a heroic attempt to ignore you.
mobzz07_5@bull.description: An acolyte is here, looking for a broom.

mobzz03@bull.examine:
This man has dedicated his life to Mateon, and the man behind

mobzz03@bull.description: Mateon's Templar is here, looking out the window.
